story.narrative: In order to As a user I want to make an operation
story.name: calculator.story
story.scenarios:
Scenario:scenario Addition Given a Calculator Class with the operation sign as <sign> When I give the first number as <number1> When I give the second number as <number2> Then I should get the result as <result>
Scenario:scenario Subtraction Given a Calculator Class with the operation sign as <sign> When I give the first number as <number1> When I give the second number as <number2> Then I should get the result as <result>
Scenario:scenario Multiplication Given a Calculator Class with the operation sign as <sign> When I give the first number as <number1> When I give the second number as <number2> Then I should get the result as <result>
Scenario:scenario Division Given a Calculator Class with the operation sign as <sign> When I give the first number as <number1> When I give the second number as <number2> Then I should get the result as <result>
